大家好，

國立東華大學自製動畫宣傳短片。
短片連結：https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=V4zMTxza7ts 

我們並非第一所製作動畫宣傳短片的大學，受到日本某大學動畫短片的啟發，結合國際事務處服務全球各國學生的經驗，製成這部動畫短片。期望透過這部動畫，傳達「花蓮」縱谷的美麗與寧靜、人的生命力與活力，和「東華」學子與環境交織成嶄新且更好自己的心境。

若這部影片讓您動動手指，google國立東華大學，那就太棒了。
誠摯邀請您和東華一起生活在縱谷這片土地上。

導演/分鏡/美術/動畫：黃韻文
配樂/音效/後期成音：王奕策

National Dong Hwa University proudly presents its original animated promotional short film.  The link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=V4zMTxza7ts

While we may not be the trailblazers in creating such animated content, our inspiration draws from a compelling initiative by a Japanese university. Merging this inspiration with the valuable experiences of our Office of International Affairs in serving a diverse global student body, we bring you this animated short film. The objective is clear – to encapsulate the serene beauty of the Hualien Rift Valley, the dynamic vitality of human life, and the harmonious integration of National Dong Hwa University students within their surroundings. The result is a narrative that reshapes and enhances one's perspective.

If this production prompts you to explore further, a simple Google search for National Dong Hwa University would be greatly appreciated. We extend a sincere invitation for you to join us and immerse yourself in the unique experience of life at National Dong Hwa University in the Hualien Valley.

Director/Storyboard/Art/Animation: Yun-Wen Huang
Music/Sound Effects/Post-Production Audio: Yi-chieh Wang
